bibl.title: The Ptolemaic to Early Roman Amethyst Quarry at Abu Diyeiba in Egypt's Eastern Desert
bibl.note: Survey conducted by J.A.H. and S.E.S., June 2004. - [Introduction.] - Regional archaeology. - Local topography and geology. - Quarry workings. - Ruins of buildings. - Pottery. - Greek inscriptions: 1. Dedication to Ptolemy VI Philometor and Cleopatra II; - 2. Dedication to Isis, Sarapis, and Pan; - 3. List of names of dedicants; - 4. Dedication to Isis and Pan; - 5. Dedication to an unknown person or deity; - 6. Dedication to Pan. - Anepigraphic stelae and selected carved objects. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: HARRELL James A., Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM, Roger S. BAGNALL, Sylvie MARCHAND, Jennifer E. GATES and Jean-Louis RIVARD, The Ptolemaic to Early Roman Amethyst Quarry at Abu Diyeiba in Egypt's Eastern Desert. Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
BIFAO 106 (2006) pp. 127-162, 1 tabl., 25 figg., profils, 3 cartes, 3 plans; - 458-460.

Survey conducted by J.A.H. and S.E.S., June 2004. - [Introduction.] - Regional archaeology. - Local topography and geology. - Quarry workings. - Ruins of buildings. - Pottery. - Greek inscriptions: 1. Dedication to Ptolemy VI Philometor and Cleopatra II; - 2. Dedication to Isis, Sarapis, and Pan; - 3. List of names of dedicants; - 4. Dedication to Isis and Pan; - 5. Dedication to an unknown person or deity; - 6. Dedication to Pan. - Anepigraphic stelae and selected carved objects. - Conclusions.
Harrell Sidebotham Bagnall Marchand Gates Rivard
